name: Adult Earth Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking, 40 ft. flying, 60 ft. burrowing
description: The Adult Earth Dragon is a large, imposing dragon with scales that resemble rough stone. It has sharp claws and a muscular build, well-equipped for battle and terrain manipulation.
memorable: Its ability to camouflage itself as a rock formation and seamlessly burrow through earth makes it a unique and challenging foe in combat.
goals: To guard its territory, manipulate the battlefield, and challenge intruders.
relations: May be encountered alongside other earth or stone creatures, or as a guardian of natural sites.
environment: Typically found in mountainous or rocky terrains, particularly in areas rich in earth and stone.
strengths: High hit points, resistance to nonmagical damage, and the ability to manipulate terrain strategically.
weaknesses: Becomes less effective when away from its linked territory, reducing its combat potential.
attacks: Multiattack includes a strong bite and slam attacks, as well as a devastating cone attack that can blind enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Scouring Breath unleashes a cone of abrasive sand and stones that inflicts severe damage and can blind foes.
senses: Has superior sensory capabilities with a passive Perception of 21 and tremorsense of 90 feet.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Nature, and Insight, demonstrating its physical prowess and intelligence.
additional_information: Can cast innate spells like 'spike growth' and 'wall of stone' without material components.
Earth Glide allows for undetected burrowing.
False Appearance ability enables it to blend in as a rock formation.
Legendary Resistance provides it an edge in saving throws.
Essence Link connects it spiritually to its territory.
spellcasting: Can innately cast 'locate animals or plants', 'spike growth', 'stone shape', and 'wall of stone' three times per day.
